232b7(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig sprul la/ de bzhin gshegs po'i sprul pa des kyang / sprul pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la chos bstan par gyur na/ lha'i bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci de la sems
232b8(khri pa): can gang gis kyang / chos ci yang bstan pa 'am/ sems can gang gis kyang chos ci yid thos pa 'am/ sems can gang gis kyang chos ci yang rnam par shes pa yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis
233a1(khri pa): / smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma mchiso// sngar ji bstan pa kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni
233a2(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar byed do// de ni de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches zab par 'chad cing / ches phra bar bstan to// snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
233a3(khri pa): gyi lha'i bu de dag gis sems la brtag nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gzugs ni zab pa ma yin te/ phra ba ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
233a4(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes ni zab pa ma yin te/ phra ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang /
233a5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni zab pa ma yin// phra ba ma yin// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dag tu ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du mig la sbyar bar byas nas/ yid kyi bar
233a6(khri pa): la yang sbar bar bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang sbar bar bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam por shes pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa/
233a7(khri pa): shes pa'i bar la sprad bya'o// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar
233a8(khri pa): bya ba nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbar bar byas nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la yod sbyar
233b1(khri pa): bar bya'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad par la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin thams cadadang /
233b2(khri pa): gzungs thaM da la sbar bar bya'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zab pa ma yin/ phra ba ma yin no// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos bstan pa 'di la
233b3(khri pa): gzugs rtag po yang med dam/ tshor ba dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa yang med dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du
233b4(khri pa): btags pa yang med dam/ nang stong pa nyid du btags pa yang med cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bar du btags pa yang med dam/ chos ston pa 'di la dran pa nye bar bzhag
233b5(khri pa): pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rtags pa yang med dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur brtag pa yang med cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
233b6(khri pa): ba bco brgyad pa kyi bar du gtagra pa med dam/ chos bstan pa 'di la rgyan tu zhags par btags pa med dam/ rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur rtag pa yang med dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
233b7(khri pa): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'de ba'i 'bras bu nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
233b8(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su btags pa yang med dam/ yi ge rnam su rtag pa yang med dam/
234a1(khri pa): @zhig tu snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu dag de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i
234a2(khri pa): bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni/ brjod du med cing snyed med pa yin te/ den sus kyang thos pa med cing / rnam
234a3(khri pa): par shes pa medado// lha'i bu dag de'i phyir gang su dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gi/
234a4(khri pa): bzod pa 'di la brten par gnas pa'am/ mngon sum du bya bar mi nuso// de bzhin du gang su dag dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed
234a5(khri pa): par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa 'am/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dang // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa'am//
234a6(khri pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang / bzod pa 'di la ma snyan par gnas pa'am/ mngon sum du bya bar mi nu so// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa
234a7(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed phyin chad thos pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
234a8(khri pa): ba khri ba las/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi tshe bstan pa ci 'dra ba zhig/
234b1(khri pa): tu 'dod par bya ba zhig yin snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu de dag gis sems/ sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag
234b2(khri pa): kho bo chos bstan pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin zhing / kho bo la chos nyan pa dag kyang sgyu ma ltar 'dod par bya ste// chos pa de ni thos par mi 'gyur la/ mngon su byed par mi 'gyur ro//
234b3(khri pa): de na lha'i bu de dag gi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa rab 'byor ci sems can de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin la/ de dag la chos bstan pa yang sgyu ma lta bu dag yin
234b4(khri pa): nam/ de bzhin du sems can rnams sprul pa lta bu dag yin la/ de dag la chos ston pa yang sprul pa lta bu dag yin nam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dge de de bzhino// ji ska
234b5(khri pa): smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dag yin pa/ de dag la chos bstan pa yid sgyu ma lta bu dag yino// sems can rnams ni sprul pa lta bu dag yin la// de dag la chos bstan pa
234b6(khri pa): yang sprul pa lta bu dag yin la/ lha'i bu gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu yino// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yi no//
234b7(khri pa): de bzhin du mig dang / bdag ga ma ma gyugasaHde bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yino// lha'i bu dag gzugs kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu
234b8(khri pa): yi no// de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yino// lha'i bu dag de bzhin du mig gis khams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu mi lta bu yin//
235a1(khri pa): de bzhin gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
235a2(khri pa): sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / re'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams
235a3(khri pa): dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yi no// de bzhin du
235a4(khri pa): mi gas 'dus te reg pa nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mi gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshe re ba'i bar dag kyang rmi lam
235a5(khri pa): lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin// lha'i bu dag de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyi dang / don dam pa stong pa
235a6(khri pa): pa nyid de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'das ma bya stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang ma med pa stong pa nyi dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
235a7(khri pa): ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid mtshan nyid stong pa nyi dang / tshwa thod stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigagra ba stong pa nyid dang / dadro ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
235a8(khri pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin// lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam zil lta bu yin// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnaMs dang / rdzu 'phrul rkang brnaMs dang / dbang po
235b1(khri pa): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o// lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang rmi
235b2(khri pa): laM lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yino// de bzhin du mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byas pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang rmi laM
235b3(khri pa): lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yi no// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rmi laM lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yino// lha'i bu dag de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
235b4(khri pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rmi la lta bu yin// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rmi laM lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin/
235b5(khri pa): bas na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang rmi la lta bu sgyu ma lta bu yin// lha'i bu dag de bzhin du rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa
235b6(khri pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rmi li lta bu sgyu ma lta bu dag yin// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa rab 'byor yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i
235b7(khri pa): byang chub kyang rmi li lta bu zhes smra 'am/ btsun pa rab 'byor mya ngan 'das pa yang rmi lo lta bu sgyu ma lta bu zhes smra 'am tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo ni/ mya ngan las
235b8(khri pa): 'das pa yang rmi li lta bu sgyu ma lta bu zhes smras te/ lha'i bu dag gal te mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde bas ches khyad par 'bags pa'i chos 'ga' zhig yod dman yang / kho bo ni chos de yang
236a1(khri pa): rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu zhes smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag 'di ltar rmi lam dang / sgyu ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa de ni gnyis su med cing / gnyis su byar med
236a2(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ra sha da ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ye'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
236a3(khri pa): byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'buM phrag du ma dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor shi rab
236a4(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar mthong bar dka' ga 'di ltar rtog par dka' ba/ 'di ltar phra ba/ 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ 'di ltar su zhig len par 'gyur ba/
236a5(khri pa): de na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
236a6(khri pa): 'di ltar zab pa/ rtag mi nus pa/ rtog gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ phra ba zhig/ mthong ba dka' ba/ rtogs par dag pa/ 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar gya nom pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'phags pa mkhas pa/
236a7(khri pa): 'dzangs pa rig par bya ba 'di/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag len par 'gyuraro// bden pa mthong ba 'am/ dgra btso pa chos kyi gting rtog pa/ brnag pa yongasu rdzog pa dag /
236a8(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dag gam/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i
236b1(khri pa): gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig par bya ba'i bar 'di/
236b2(khri pa): ston pa'i tshe len par 'gyur te/ de dag ni gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gzug so snyam du rnam par rtog par 'gyu ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
236b3(khri pa): byed rnaMs dang / rnaM bar shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid rnam par shes// snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyu ro// gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa gzugs
236b4(khri pa): s+t+waM du rnaM pA rtog par mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par she pa'o// sgo du rnaM ba
236b5(khri pa): rtog pa mi 'gyur ro// gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med pa gzugaso snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
236b6(khri pa): rna bar shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang smon pa med pa rna par she pa'o// snyam du rna bar rtog par mi 'gyu ro// de ltar na gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs skye ba medo ste du rnaM bar rtog par mi 'gyur zhing /
236b7(khri pa): 'gag pa me do skye pa dang / dben pa'o ste pa'i bar du rna bar rtog par mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba medo ste du rna par rtog pa mi
236b8(khri pa): 'gyuraro zhing / 'gag pa mdo snyam pa dang / dben pa'o snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuraro// gzugs zhi ba'o ste du rnaM par rtog par mi 'gyuraro// tshor ba dang / 'du shrI dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
237a1(khri pa): ther khri#rnam par shes pa zhi ba'o// snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mig gi bar dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la/ yang de bzhin
237a2(khri pa): du sbyar bar bya'o// yid dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ga dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar lasang
237a3(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
237a4(khri pa): ba'i bar la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyas kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du ting
237a5(khri pa): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la yang sbyar bar
237a6(khri pa): bya'o// de ltar na de dag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad
237a7(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma med do zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa med do zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med
237a8(khri pa): ba zad mkhyen pa nyid do// snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuro// 'dus byas kyi khams stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid 'dus byas kyi kham so snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuro//
237b1(khri pa): de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi khams mtshan ma med do zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas kyi kham so snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus byas kyi khams smon pa med do zhes bya ba
237b2(khri pa): dang / smon pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khamaso snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar du skye
237b3(khri pa): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben par rnam par rtog par mi 'gyu ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu dag 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
237b4(khri pa): pa nas/ dri ma med pa 'phags pa mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig par bya ba 'di la ni/ len par byed par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos 'ga' yang
237b5(khri pa): ma brjod cing / yongasu ma bstan pa'i phyir te/ ji ltar 'dir chos 'ga' yang yongasu ma brjod cing / yongasu ma bstan pa de ltar 'di sems can 'ga' len par 'gyur ba med do// // shes
237b6(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa// / bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ta ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
237b7(khri pa): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir theg pa gsum po bstan pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
237b8(khri pa): kyi theg pa dag rgya cher bstan cing byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po rnams yongasu bzung ba yang bstan la/ sem dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sa bcu pa'i sem bskyed pa'i bar
238a1(khri pa): sher tra @#dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas/
238a2(khri pa): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag snyan cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
238a3(khri pa): chen po rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis dngon par shes pas/ rnam pas brtse ba dag kyang bstan la/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams
238a4(khri pa): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa yongasu mi mnyam pa'i chos can 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gi 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgya
238a5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sti stang bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par byed par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
238a6(khri pa): de dag las chos gang thos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshul gyi
238a7(khri pa): rtag tu mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don bzang po dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
238a8(khri pa): 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa rab mchog can gyur pa dag kyang bstan nas/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bral
238b1(khri pa): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir/ theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs
238b2(khri pa): rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag rgya cher bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongasu bzung ba yang bstan pa nas/ de bzhin
238b3(khri pa): du sbyar te ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa rab mchog can gyi bar du 'gyur zhing yang dmigs pa'i
238b4(khri pa): tshul gyis bstan pa nas/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
238b5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshal dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid dang
238b6(khri pa): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam
238b7(khri pa): yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
238b8(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
239a1(khri pa): shed gyi@#rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir theg pa gsum po dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan cing / de bzhin du ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
239a2(khri pa): dpa' chen po rnams yongasu bzung ba bstan pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad la khyad par 'phags pa'i spobs pa rab mchog can gyi
239a3(khri pa): bar du 'gyur la/ de bzhin yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//
239a4(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi theg pa gsum po dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston to// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong
239a5(khri pa): pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyi theg pa gsum po dag rgya cher stan to// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston to// de bzhin du nang stong sa
239a6(khri pa): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bzung ba ston cing / de bzhind sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten tham
239a7(khri pa): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i spobs pa rab mchog can gyi bar du bzung ba ston cing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las d+ha
239a8(khri pa): bar 'phags pa'i rlobs pa rab mchog can gyi bar du 'gyur zhing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa dang / de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo babo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ben pa
239b1(khri pa): rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba ston pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par da 'phags pa'i spobs pa rab mchog can gyi bar dag tu 'gyur zhing /
239b2(khri pa): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan to// de nas 'khor de na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i
239b3(khri pa): bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
239b4(khri pa): mthus gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la/ legs par bshad do// a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o// a la la chos
239b5(khri pa): kyi chos nyid 'di na legs par bshad pa'o// zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang mi 'bral ba de ni/
239b6(khri pa): bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid bzung bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
239b7(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmig su ma mchis kyang / theg pa gsum po rnam par dgod par yang mdzad de/ theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
239b8(khri pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang 'dogs par yang mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i snyi bu de
240a1(khri pa): sher khre @dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// khyed ji skad zer ba yin te/ lha'i bu dag 'di lta ste/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnam sam/
240a2(khri pa): rnam par shes pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ chos gang yang dmigasu med cing / theg pa gsum rnam par 'god par yang mdzad de/ theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos
240a3(khri pa): kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rtog par yang mdzad do// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
240a4(khri pa): dag ma bral ba de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gang yin pa de ni khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du zung shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir theg pa gsum
240a5(khri pa): po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rgya cher bstan cing / lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na ya
240a6(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pas dmig su med/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dang
240a7(khri pa): las gud na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag las gud na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med/
240a8(khri pa): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'i bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs med/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa
240b1(khri pa): nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de dag thams cad las slob te/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ de bzhin
240b2(khri pa): du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar spyod
240b3(khri pa): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag gis tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad
240b4(khri pa): ma can du pad ma lngas gtor te tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar ma 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
240b5(khri pa): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ de bzhin du nang stong pa
240b6(khri pa): nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang bral bar ma gyur//
240b7(khri pa): de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzugs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
240b8(khri pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
241a1(khri pa): she'i @#/ bral bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi nga las/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal te barba
241a2(khri pa): bo la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
241a3(khri pa): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
241a4(khri pa): byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
241a5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtong ba'i tshul gyis phan 'dogs pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
241a6(khri pa): mkhor bzhi po 'di lta ste/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas de bzhin
241a7(khri pa): du sbyar te/ 'og min gyi lha rnams 'das par gyur te/ 'khor bar thug su chud nas/ thams cad dbang du btsugs te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems
241a8(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ lnga 'am/ lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab
241b1(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zos nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar gyur pa de la/ bdud sdig can nam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha grags tshol ba rnams kyis glags dang skabs
241b2(khri pa): rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des gzugs stong pa nyid du shin tu byin gyis brlabs shing / de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes
241b3(khri pa): stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags ma
241b4(khri pa): rnyed ta/ mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glag mi rnyed/ smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glag mi rnyed pa'i phyiraro// de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des
241b5(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid du shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// de ltar gong ma nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed mtshan ma med par gyur pa'i chos de dag la glags mi rnyed
241b6(khri pa): smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glag mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis de glags sbed par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag la glag rnyed par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med
241b7(khri pa): phyir te// kye'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas glags rnyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des sems can thams cad
241b8(khri pa): la byams pa'i sems shin tu sgom shing / de bzhin du snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems shin tu bsgoms te/ der yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
242a1(khri pa): shing khri @#sgom pa'i phyir ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngas gshis ngan du mchi bar yang mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i
242a2(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i bde ba nye bar bsgrub pas/ bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i rgyal
242a3(khri pa): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang /
242a4(khri pa): tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha
242a5(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa mthong nas/ ma bzung ba dang / ma bcings pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar du snyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ ban
242a6(khri pa): bar bya/ klog par bya/ kun chub par bya// tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar bya'o// 'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
242a7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rgyal bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar ni/
242a8(khri pa): 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag khang stong na 'dug kyang rung / bragab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / 'dun khang na 'dug kyang rung te/ 'jig pa dang / bag cha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa da//
242b1(khri pa): byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgom shing / de bzhin du rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i
242b2(khri pa): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid shin tu bsgom/ de bzhin du rtag tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar da shin tu sgom/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ stong gsum
242b3(khri pa): gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
242b4(khri pa): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha 'khod pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
242b5(khri pa): kyi bra mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du
242b6(khri pa): yid la bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la/ bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab par bgyid lags so//
242b7(khri pa): de ci'i mdu zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dud 'gro skye gnas rnams rnan chad/
242b8(khri pa): par 'thug mi 'bul po rnams dang / klu dbul po rnams dang / gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang / sems kyi bron thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / blon 'go dang / 'thug pa rnams kyi ste
243a1(khri pa): sher khri @#'byung sel bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin du mu ge dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ sems par 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang
243a2(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi rna lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi
243a3(khri pa): dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
243a4(khri pa): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
243a5(khri pa): tu phyin pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
243a6(khri pa): stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
243a7(khri pa): bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
243a8(khri pa): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin bram ze'i shing sa la chen po lta bu da//
243b1(khri pa): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
243b2(khri pa): 'gyur lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams mchis lagaso// de bzhin du 'og
243b3(khri pa): min gyi bar gyi lha rnams mchis lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mchis lag so// /
243b4(khri pa): de bzhin du len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir mI ba'i 'bras bu dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mchis lags so// rang sangs rgyas mchis
243b5(khri pa): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba mchis lagaso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
243b6(khri pa): yongasu dag par bgyi ba mchis las so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs las so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang 'jig rten na mchis lagaso// de na/
243b7(khri pa): du sangs rgyas dkon mchog bzhugs lag so// chos dkon mchog bzhugs lag so// dge 'dun dkon mchog mchis lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
243b8(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang me dang lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang / sgrub par bgyilag so// de skad ces gsoral to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po gtu byin pa 'di dad ces ga la
244a1(khri pa): sher bri @#stsal to// kre'u shi ka de de bzhino// khyed kyi ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ kre'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur
244a2(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du chos dkon mchog 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten du
244a3(khri pa): 'byung bar 'gyur// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/
244a4(khri pa): ri mor byas/ mchod par byas shing / de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sti
244a5(khri pa): stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par bya bar bya ba sems pa yin no// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
244a6(khri pa): 'jig rten gyis rtag tu sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod par bya zhing / de la rtag tu rgyun ma chad par bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
244a7(khri pa): rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis 'di lta ste/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ sdug ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ gtil gyi zhing ltar yongs su
244a8(khri pa): gang la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis sti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang gis
244b1(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral ba cig la sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid rigs kyi bu 'am
244b2(khri pa): rigs kyi bu mo des ches bsod nams mang po bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la rten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin
244b3(khri pa): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyis/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas ni/ nyan thos dang /
244b4(khri pa): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'
244b5(khri pa): chen po rnams la/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag ta sti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor bya/ mchod par zhing / de bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi chad cing / bsrang ba dang / skyab pa
244b6(khri pa): dang // sba bar bya'o// shes rab pha rol tu phyin khri pa las/ rnam par rtog pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
244b7(khri pa): gsol to// btsan pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
244b8(khri pa): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum gyis mi gos pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs
245a1(khri pa): sher khri @#dang ldan par gyur pa dang / thams cad kyi rab rib sel bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad kyi sngon pa
245a2(khri pa): ma mchis pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 'jigs pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa
245a3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni migs yongs su gzung ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la snang bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
245a4(khri pa): ba ni mtha' gnyid rnam par spangs pa'i slad du lam log par zhugs pa rnams la lam ston pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang /
245a5(khri pa): bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni// sangs rgyas kyi chos
245a6(khri pa): thams cad bskyed pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du skye ba ma mchis
245a7(khri pa): ba dang / 'jig pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu b+hA ni ther zug tu gnas pa dang 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'khor ba rnam par spong bar bgyid pa lags so//
245a8(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che thams cad stsal ba'i slad du/ mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon du bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
245b1(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'i slad du/ stobs yongasu rdzogs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skor ba
245b2(khri pa): dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ lan gsum bzlab te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bar bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
245b3(khri pa): phyin pa ni dngos po yongasu ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par ston pa lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ byang chub sems dpa
245b4(khri pa): theg pa pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji
245b5(khri pa): ltar ston pa la gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar ston pa la phyag bya ba ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang de ltar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
245b6(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
245b7(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rab tu phye ba yin zhing / de bzhin du byang chub sems
245b8(khri pa): dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu phye ba dang / shes byad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni//
246a1(khri pa): sher khri#dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten la rab tu phye ba dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
246a2(khri pa): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang / nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten la rab tu
246a3(khri pa): phye ba yin/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu phye ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du phye zhing / rnam pa thams cad
246a4(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bye ba'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu zhu ba 'di ga las byung / gleng bzhi ni gang zhig yin snyam mo// de nas lha'i
246a5(khri pa): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti bu la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu zhu ba 'di las byung / gleng bzhi ni gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
246a6(khri pa): bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa rnams ni/ thabs mkhas pas
246a7(khri pa): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i 'bar skabs der dge ba
246a8(khri pa): gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de dag los gzhan pa'i sems can thams kyi
246b1(khri pa): theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad zlums shing mngon par bsdus te/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 'i byang
246b2(khri pa): chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pas/ kho bo ni zhu ba 'di 'byung ngo // ke'u shi ka yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
246b3(khri pa): zil gyis gnon par byed pa yino// de bzhin du/ khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas zil
246b4(khri pa): gyis gnon pa yin no// ki'u shi ka dper na dbus long rnams ni brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum yang rung ste dmigs su med pa na/ lam du 'gro ba 'am/ grong ngam grong brdal lam/ grong khyer ram/
246b5(khri pa): yul 'khor du 'jug par mi nus te/ ji ltar de bzhin du thams cad ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la bskal pa med cing / 'ong ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/ ke'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dmus
246b6(khri pa): long lta bur gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dmig su med pa de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni lam nas
246b7(khri pa): lam du 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du 'jug pa'i skal ba med de/ ke'u shi ka gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams/
246b8(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin par gyur na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag dang / mig dang ldan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pas yongs su zin pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag kyang pha rol tu
247a1(khri pa): sher khri#phyin pa'i ming thob po// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
247a2(khri pa): yongasu bzung na/ lnga po 'di dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'o ming ma thob po// zhes smras na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung na/ pha rol
247a3(khri pa): tu phyin pa'i ming thob nas/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol lcid+mas yongs su bzung ba
247a4(khri pa): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba lnga po 'di dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bam/ smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin to/ 'on kyang byang chub sems
247a5(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
247a6(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// ke'u shi ka de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
247a7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis nang nas/ mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / rab mchog gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
247a8(khri pa): ba sha ra dA ba ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
247b1(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs mngon par bsgrub du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
247b2(khri pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/
247b3(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar tu mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar dang /
247b4(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mngon par
247b5(khri pa): bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
247b6(khri pa): nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs mngon par sgrub tu ma mchis slod
247b7(khri pa): du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mngon par bsgrub du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
247b8(khri pa): byin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / spyi ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs
248a1(khri pa): sher khri#su med pa'i phyir dang / 'jigs med pa'i phyir dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
248a2(khri pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / dmigs su med pa'i
248a3(khri pa): phyir dang / 'jigs med pa'i phyir de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad
248a4(khri pa): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrub na/ chos gang zhig thob par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gang yang thob
248a5(khri pa): par mi byed de/ des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos ji ltar yang thob par bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
248a6(khri pa): stsal pa/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// de bzhin du 'jigs rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
248a7(khri pa): rnams dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams thob par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
248a8(khri pa): sha ra da ti bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang dag la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa yin te/ des na de ni chos gang yang thob par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i
248b1(khri pa): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang
248b2(khri pa): po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsum pa bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid cing / dmigs par mi bgyid lags sam/
248b3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed cing / rigs
248b4(khri pa): par med do// gsol btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid cing / dmigs par mi bgyid lags/ bcom
248b5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ ming ji ltar ba dang / mtshan rdzi lta ba bzhin dang / mtshan mar 'du bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shes
248b6(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par mi byed do// gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji ltar mkhas mi
248b7(khri pa): len pa dang / gnas par mi byed pa dang / spong bar mi byed pa dang / mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / ci la yang thob par byed pa de ltar thob pa byed do// ke'u shi ka de ltar shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
248b8(khri pa): chos ci yang thob par mi byed par chos thams cad thob par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
249a1(khri pa): she tu phyin pa 'di chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par shes pa
249a2(khri pa): ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ni ngo mtshar lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// byucom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
249a3(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad thob par byed dam/ 'on te thob par mi byed snyam du 'du shes//
249a4(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang ring du bgyid pa lag so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
249a5(khri pa): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing / de bzhin du rgyang ring du byed pa'i
249a6(khri pa): rnam grangs yod de/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsob bo// gsogo/
249a7(khri pa): snying po med pa'o// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ya ma bla'o snyam du 'du shes na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor gang gis byang
249a8(khri pa): chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam gadra ni de yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
249b1(khri pa): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob ches pas na/ chos gang la blo ba che ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
249b2(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches na/ gzugs la yid mi ches so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
249b3(khri pa): par shes pa la yid mi ches so// thig la yid mi shes pas na/ yid kyi bar la yid mi che so// gzugs kyi skye mched la yid mi ches pas na/ yid kyi skye chad la yid mi cheso// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag
249b4(khri pa): pa rnams la yid mi ches pa nas/ 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la yid mi che so// nang stong pa nyid la yid mi ches pas na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir la yid mi
249b5(khri pa): ches so// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yid mi ches pa nas/ 'phag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la yid mi cheso// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yid mi
249b6(khri pa): ches pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yid mi che so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid mi ches so// de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
249b7(khri pa): ba'i 'bras bu la yid mi ches so// rang byang chub la yid mi chis so// rang bang chub la yid ma chas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yid mi che so// thams cad shes pa nyid la
249b8(khri pa): yid mi ches so// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la yid michis so// rab 'byor 'on kyang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yid cheso// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
250a1(khri pa): sher khri'adu shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
250a2(khri pa): pa nyid kyi bar du dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid cheso// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid ches pa yin// de bzhin
250a3(khri pa): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yid ches pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
250a4(khri pa): yid ches pa yino// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dpal rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250a5(khri pa): 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam grangs gang gis na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin
250a6(khri pa): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ gzugs chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sbyin pa'i
250a7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngu mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
250a8(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa chen por mi bgyi/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid chen por mi bgyid// chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chen por mi
250b1(khri pa): bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chen por mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/
250b2(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/
250b3(khri pa): byang chub chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngu mi bgyid/ sangs rgyas chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid lagaso// gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs sdud par mi bgyid/ 'phro bar
250b4(khri pa): mi dgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams// rnam par shes pa bsdud par mi bgyid/ 'gro bar mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsdud par mi bgyi/
250b5(khri pa): 'phro bar mi bgyid pa lag so// gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs tshad mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshad
250b6(khri pa): mchis par mi bgyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid lag so// gzhan yang shes rlab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs yang bar mi bgyid/ dog par mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor bar ba dang / 'du shes
250b7(khri pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yangs par ma bgyid// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bar du yangs par mi bgyid/ dog par mi bgyid lag so// gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
250b8(khri pa): dz+r-i/
250b9(khri pa): gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan pa mi bgyid/ stobs chung dar
251a1(khri pa): sher khri@#bar mi bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa lag so// btsun bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
251a2(khri pa): des na lte ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// btsu pa bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa la gsar du
251a3(khri pa): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten/ de bzhin du bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
251a4(khri pa): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rten nas/ 'di snyam du shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gzugs chen por mi
251a5(khri pa): bgyid pa 'am// chung ngur mi bgyid pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por bgyid pa 'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs
251a6(khri pa): rgyas kyi bar du chen por bgyid pa 'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ stong chung ngu'i bar du bgyid pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
251a7(khri pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid pa 'am/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa'o// snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang
251a8(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang gzugs che bar bgyi ba la/ chung bar bgyid pa laM/ de bzhin du
251b1(khri pa): sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du che bar bgyid pa 'ag chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags/ gang gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa la/ stobs chung bar bgyid
251b2(khri pa): bal/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa'i// stobs chung bar bskyed pa 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du
251b3(khri pa): stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ stob chung bar bgyid pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa lags/ gang gzugs chen por bgyid pa 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa'am/ de bzhin du tshor
251b4(khri pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa chen por bgyid pa 'am/ chung ngur bgyid pa 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/
251b5(khri pa): stobs chung bar bgyid pa de ni dmigs pa chen po'i lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa 'du shes rnams la ni/ byang chub gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe
251b6(khri pa): naH'di ltar sems can ma skyes pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs ma skyes pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes
251b7(khri pa): bar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du
251b8(khri pa): sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du ma skyes pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes par blta bar bgyi/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo ga
252a1(khri pa): mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par
252a2(khri pa): blta bar bgyi/ seMs can stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid lta ba bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid blta
252a3(khri pa): bar bgyi/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shed rnams dang / rno bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid du blta ba bgyi/ sem can dben pa nyid kyi
252a4(khri pa): slad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid blta ba bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam pa shes pa dben pa nyid kyi slad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252a5(khri pa): byin pa dben pa nyid du lta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sang+yas kyi bar du dben pa nyid kyi sla du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid du lta bar bgyi/ sems can ma mchi bI sma du/ shes rab
252a6(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mchis pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ shA rab kyi
252a7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis pa nyidadu ltelta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis bzhid du 'alta bar bgyi/ sems can 'am
252a8(khri pa): gyi mi khyab po'i nyid kyi spad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am gyi mi khyab pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nas dang / rnaM shes babs kyi mi/
252b1(khri pa): khyab pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi bu du bsam gyi mi khyab pa nyid kyi slad nga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252b2(khri pa): zhi ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa nyid du blta bar bgyi/ sems can 'jig pa ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa ma mchis par lta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang /
252b3(khri pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa ma mchis par lta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du
252b4(khri pa): sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'jig pa ma mchis slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa ma mchis par lta bar bgyi/ sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i
252b5(khri pa): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / naM
252b6(khri pa): par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab ma mchis par lta bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
252b7(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis par lta bar bgyi/ sems can stobs/
252b8(khri pa): dang mi ldan pa'i sladu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang ldan pa lta bab bgyi/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes
253a1(khri pa): pa rtog pa dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par lnga bar bgyi/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du stob dang mi ldan
253a2(khri pa): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
253a3(khri pa): phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// /
253a4(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongasu sprugs pa de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongasu sgrags pa ma mdzad lags/ tshul khrims
253a5(khri pa): kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongasasu bsgrags pa ma mdzad pa lag/
253a6(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongasu skrag par mdzad pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dug gi ring
253a7(khri pa): yongasu skrag pa mdzad pa lag so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
253a8(khri pa): mi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis sngon du 'gro ba yin zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyiraro// kun dga' po 'di jim ma
253b1(khri pa): du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangasu 'gro ba'i snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// kun
253b2(khri pa): dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam tan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su ma sngos
253b3(khri pa): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bco ldan 'das ma lag so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
253b4(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sbyin pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu bsngos na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
253b5(khri pa): bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi ba nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glag su mchi lags/ btso
253b6(khri pa): ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sbyin pa gnyi su med pa'i tshul gyi/ rnaM pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yod sngos na/ sbyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// de bzhin du sbyar
253b7(khri pa): she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyi su med pa'i tshul g+hi/ rna ba thad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe na bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// de bzhin du skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / dmig
253b8(khri pa): su med pa'i tshul gyi rna ba zad ma byed pa nyid yongad bsngos na/ zhes bya ba'i grang su 'gro'o// shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa khri ba pa po bdun pa/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad ji ltar na sbyin pa gnyis
254a1(khri pa): ma mchis pa tshul dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sde ba gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmig su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyi/ rna ba thaMd mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos na/ sbyin pi pa
254a2(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grang su mchis lags/ de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar da gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmig su
254a3(khri pa): ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangasu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa pa/ gzugs
254a4(khri pa): gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du tshor rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes gnyi su med pa'i rdul dang / byang chub kyi bar du gnyi su med pa'i tshul gyiso// gsol
254a5(khri pa): pa ji ltar gzugs gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // byang chub kyi bar du gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzug kyis
254a6(khri pa): stong // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar ni byang chub kyi stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pho/
254a7(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / gzugs ni gnyi su med cing / gnyi su dper med la/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi 'du ni/ gnyi su med cing gnyi su med pa'i phyiraro// kun
254a8(khri pa): dgangad 'di lta ba na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis sngon du 'gro ba yin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon 'dren pa yin// dper na sa chen po las
254b1(khri pa): gang btab pa dag ni/ tshogs pa snyed nas skye ste/ sa chen po de dag gi rten yi no// kun dga' bo de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten na byung ste/ shes rab pa
254b2(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa de dag ni rten yin no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten nas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
254b3(khri pa): kyi ba rad 'byung zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la rten na ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres
254b4(khri pa): pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag yin te/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag ni yong su 'dren pa yin zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu
254b5(khri pa): brgyad kyi bar dag yin ni/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
254b6(khri pa): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
254b7(khri pa): bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa ning / yon tan gang dag yongasu 'dzin pa'i yon tan de dag thad ni bka' ma stsal legs te/ btsun pa bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi
254b8(khri pa): rgol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis na ni/ dge ba bcu'i la kyi la rnam 'jig rten du 'byung lag so// de bzhin du bas gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
255a1(khri pa): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa bzhi dang / sadus kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung lag so/ btsun pa bco lnga 'das shes
255a2(khri pa): pha rol tu ba bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyis na/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten mchis lag so// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
255a3(khri pa): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa bar du bgyis na/ de
255a4(khri pa): bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yA dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnam 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bco ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dag bo la 'di skad
255a5(khri pa): ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa de la ni/ yon tan de 'ba' shig/
255a6(khri pa): tu bzad par mi smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / badra ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
255a7(khri pa): bA byed pa dang / tshul bzhi du yid la byed pa dang / thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyiseMs dang yA 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/ tshul khrim kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'gyur/ de bzhin du ga shes rab
255a8(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni ti nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rA kyi phung po dang / rna ba grol ba'i phung po dang /
255b1(khri pa): rnam pa grol ba'i ye she mthong ba'i phung po dang / tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chab dang / klog pa dang /
255b2(khri pa): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs par rig pa bya'o// kun dag
255b3(khri pa): do nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrim kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam pa grol ba ye she
255b4(khri pa): mthong ba'i phung po gang yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po nas/ rnam par grol ba'i yis mthong ba'i phung po'i bu ni/ kun dag po rig kyi bu'o//
255b5(khri pa): rigs kyi bu mo de'i tshul khris kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rna bar grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i yis mthong ba'i phung po gang
255b6(khri pa): yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i yis mthong ba'i phung po rgya'i char yang mi 'gro ba na/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di
255b7(khri pa): ltar rigs kyi bu'o/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tham cad sa las sems rnam par grol zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gis chos la 'dod pa med pa'i
255b8(khri pa): phyiro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ge bris nas/ 'chang zhing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos
255b9(khri pa): sa dog nam pa'a' dag / 'dugs dang / rgyal can choms dgags/ skye stang du byed/ thamar byed/ ri mor byed na/ kun dag bo rigs kyi bu gas kyi bu mad 'i di dang /
256a1(khri pa): yon tan dang / phan yon de dag ni yin par smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ce gsol to// btsun
256a2(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
256a3(khri pa): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang gler bris ma/ yi ger 'brir btsal nas/ me tog dang /
256a4(khri pa): ba dan dag gis bar dag dang / rol mo'i skra dag gis sti stang bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa de dag la bdag gis kyang rtag de dag rgyun mi 'chad pa bsrung ba dang /
256a5(khri pa): sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid la shin tu gan pa yin te/ de'i
256a6(khri pa): phyir shes rA kyi pha rotu phyin pa la glan ka tshol ba byed pa 'ga' yang / yA dag pA rje su mi mthong // shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la glen ka tshol ba de yA dag pA rje su ma mthong ste/ kun dag bo de ltar
256a7(khri pa): na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzi brjid kyis/ yong su zin pa kyang grags ma rnyed do// kun dag po gzhan lnga rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab
256a8(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa de'i sems zham par mi 'gyur/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur/ dang ngas par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
256b1(khri pa): kun dga' bo 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am// 'gong par 'gyur ba'am/ dngangs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba'i phyiraro// rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
256b2(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar byed pa dang / de nyid yi ger bris sam/ yi ger 'brir bcug nas/ sti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed
256b3(khri pa): pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de'i tshe 'di dang / phyi ma'i yon tan dang / phan yon 'di yang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'dza' bshes dang / nyed dang / snag gi snyen
256b4(khri pa): mtshams dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha rnams dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi rlung gi
